com.example.avengersandroidsatesmaker

Class EditCircuitActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.avengersandroidsatesmaker.EditCircuitActivity

  • public class EditCircuitActivity
extends Activity
    The Activity where the user edit the circuit The user can add or remove inputs, outputs, internals and edit the design
    Author:
    A.Aly
